title: How to Bake a Sour Cream Orange Cake

steps.headline: Grease and flour a 10-inch tube pan (angel food cake pan)
Put all the ingredients for the cake into a mixing bowl.
Mix on low speed for 3 minutes.
Pour batter into the prepared pan.
Bake for 60 to 70 minutes.
steps.description: The cake surface will spring back when lightly touched when the cake is done.

steps.headline: Cool 15 minutes in pan on wire baking rack.
Remove cake from pan and let cool completely.
Mix powdered sugar and orange juice together in a small bowl.
Spread lightly over top of cooled cake.
Allow some of the glaze to flow down the side of the cake.

text: Orange Cake Preheat oven to 325 °F (163 °C).  Grease and flour a 10-inch tube pan (angel food cake pan)  Put all the ingredients for the cake into a mixing bowl.  Mix on low speed for 3 minutes.  Pour batter into the prepared pan.  Bake for 60 to 70 minutes. The cake surface will spring back when lightly touched when the cake is done. Cool 15 minutes in pan on wire baking rack.  Remove cake from pan and let cool completely.  Glaze Mix powdered sugar and orange juice together in a small bowl.  Spread lightly over top of cooled cake.  Allow some of the glaze to flow down the side of the cake.  Serves 16.  Finished.
